src:
BPBD: Gedung Sekolah di Pasuruan Ambruk Akibat Kesalahan Konstruksi Bangunan
05 Nov 2019, 15:47 by iman


BPBD: Gedung Sekolah di Pasuruan Ambruk Akibat Kesalahan Konstruksi Bangunan

KBRN, Pasuruan: Gedung SDN Gentong I Pasuruan, Jawa Timur ambruk. Ambruknya gedung sekolah ini mengakibatkan dua orang meninggal dunia dan 12 orang mengalami luka-luka.Bangunan sekolah ambruk menimpa SDN Gentong PersisÂ  pukul 09.00 WIB yang beralamat di Jl. KH Sepuh, Kel. Gentong, Kec. Gadingrejo.Kepala Pelaksana BPBD Provinsi Jatim, Suban W menduga ambruknya bangunan tersebut akibat kesalahan konstruksi bangunan yang dibangun pada tahun 2017 lalu."Akibat kejadian tersebut mengakibatkan 5 bangunan kelas ambruk total dan menimpa seluruh penghuni ruangan yang pada saat itu sedang diadakan kegiatan belajar mengajar," kata Subhan, Selasa (5/11/2019) dalam keterangan tertulisnya.Korban meninggal dunia 2 (dua) orang, antara lain :- Sevina Arsy Wijaya (P/19) Pengajar.Alamat : Jl. MT. Hariyono, gang 4, Kel. Mandaranrejo, Kec. Panggungrejo, Kota Pasuruan- Irza Amira (P/8) siswi kelas 2 SDN Gentong.Alamat : Jl. KH Sepuh, Kel. Gentong, Kec. Gadingrejo, Kota PasuruanKorban luka berat 2 (dua) orang antara lain :- Abdul Mukti (L/8) Patah tulang paha kiri- Dina hilda handin, (L/10) patah tulang terbukaKorban luka ringan 10 (sepuluh) orang antara lain :- Zidan Izzulhaq (L/8)- Wildanul firdausi (L/11)- Alysah (P/7)- Kina (P/8)- Akbar (L/8)- Siti Rohmania (P/8)- Aisyah (P/8)- Zahra Salsabila (P/9)- Ahmad Gerhana (L/8)- Moh. Putra (L/11)
text:
BPBD: School Building in Pasuruan Collapsed Due to Building Construction Error
05 Nov 2019, 15:47 by faith


BPBD: School Building in Pasuruan Collapsed Due to Building Construction Error

KBRN, Pasuruan: Gentong I Elementary School Building in Pasuruan, East Java collapsed. The collapse of this school building resulted in two deaths and 12 people were injured. The school building collapsed on SDN Gentong Persis at 09.00 WIB located at Jl. KH Sepuh, Ex. Gentong, Kec. Gadingrejo.Head of BPBD of East Java Province, Suban W suspects the collapse of the building was due to a construction error that was built in 2017. "As a result of the incident resulted in 5 class buildings completely collapsed and befall all occupants of the room at the time being held teaching and learning activities, "Subhan said, Tuesday (11/5/2019) in his written statement. Two people died, including: - Sevina Arsy Wijaya (P / 19) Lecturer. Address: Jl. MT. Hariyono, alley 4, Ex. Mandaranrejo, Kec. Panggungrejo, Pasuruan City - Irza Amira (P / 8), a class 2 student at SDN Gentong. Address: Jl. KH Sepuh, Ex. Gentong, Kec. Gadingrejo, Pasuruan City 2 (two) people were seriously injured, including: - Abdul Mukti (L / 8) Broken left thigh bone - Dina hilda handin, (L / 10) open fracture. 10 (ten) minor injuries included: - Zidan Izzulhaq (L / 8) - Wildanul firdausi (L / 11) - Alysah (P / 7) - Quinine (P / 8) - Akbar (L / 8) - Siti Rohmania (P / 8) - Aisha (P / 8 ) - Zahra Salsabila (F / 9) - Ahmad Gerhana (L / 8) - Moh. Men (L / 11)
